raw_body: PANABOKKE – Dr. C.R. – It is with great sadness that we announce the demise of Vidya Jyothi Deshamanya Dr. C.R. Panabokke,​ Former Director of Agriculture and Former Chancellor of the University of Sabaragamuwa,​ beloved husband of late Seemanthani,​ loving father of late Aruni and Renuka and Himadri. His remains will lie at his residence No. 439/​8,​ Sudharshana Mawatha,​ Nawala on Wednesday the 30th of August 2023 and at “The Restpect” Parlour on Thursday the 31st of August 2023. The Cremation will take place on Thursday the 31st of August 2023 at 5.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.054273
